title: DAY IN MY LIFE AT THE FARM! Part 1

tasks.task: Performing daily farm chores and care for animals
subtasks: Waking up early in the morning
Feeding cats (Delilah and Benelli)
Walking the dogs
Checking on livestock (bunnies) and performing animal welfare tasks like relocating a baby bunny
Fixing water lines for animals (horses)
Unloading and handling hay for horses
Searching for and temporarily caring for lost dogs found on the property
Traveling to nearby locations (Home Depot, Lake City) for farm-related errands
Unloading and distributing collected materials (wood shavings) on the farm
Demonstrating farm entertaining and engaging with the audience through commentary and interactions

tasks.task: Detailing the challenges and observations of farm life
subtasks: Noting weather impacts on farm activities
Observing animal behavior and health concerns
Discussing the ongoing nature of farm chores and the evolving needs of the property
Sharing experiences and problem-solving related to equipment and supply management

tasks.task: Performing daily farm routines and chores
subtasks: Waking up early in the morning
Feeding cats (Delilah and Benelli)
Walking dogs (Delilah and Benelli)
Checking on baby bunnies and providing care
Fixing water lines for horses (including cutting, gluing, and installing new PVC pipe)
Unloading and distributing hay (12 bales) into horse stalls
Searching for and temporarily caring for lost dogs found on the property
Traveling to Home Depot to purchase garbage bags
Traveling to Lake City to collect wood shavings for the farm
Unloading and distributing wood shavings to the barn
